DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you. No further inquiries. The Prosecution subjected Lieutenant Adams to an exhaustive cross-examination regarding the investigative methods. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Parker, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts were also brought forth to testify.
